Text: Please verify your email addressHello Thank you for registering for a Microsoft NET Passport Please take a moment to help us verify your email address This ensures that NET Passport can respond to you if you contact us about a service issue In addition some participating NET Passport sites may require you to verify your email address to take full advantage of their own services The email address you registered as your NET Passport is PLEASE VERIFY THAT THIS IS YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS by clicking this link EmailPagesrfEmailIDDDFFECEAFURLNum NET Passport will display a Web page confirming that your email address has been verified IF CLICKING A LINK DOESNT WORK Copy it and then paste it into your Web browsers address bar Select the entire link which starts with and may include more than one line and then copy it usually by clicking the Edit menu item and then clicking Copy Next open your Web browser and click in the box where you usually see the Web page address Paste the link into this box usually by clicking Paste in the Edit menu and click Go or Enter NET Passport is committed to protecting your privacy We encourage you to review our privacy statement at privacypolicyasp For more information about NET Passport visit For additional help click the following link to contact NET Passport Customer Support contactussrfLC Thank you for using your NET Passport NET Passport Customer Support Please do not reply to this message it was sent from an unmonitored email address and we are unable to respond to any replies

Welcome to Microsoft NET PassportThank you for registering for a Microsoft NET Passport at a participating Web site Use the email address and password you provided during registration to sign in instantly at any NET Passportenabled Web site that displays the NET Passport signin button If you also created a Passport wallet you can use it to make faster easier purchases at sites that offer the Passport express purchase service If you didnt create a Passport wallet and you would like to well tell you how below You can see a list of NET Passport sites at directoryasp The rest of this email message contains important information about how to use your NET Passport You may want to refer back to it on occasion so please save it or print a copy TO SIGN IN AND SIGN OUT AT A NET PassportENABLED SITE TO SIGN IN click the NET Passport sign in button on the site and then type your email address and password in the signin box that appears You can sign in to some NET Passportenabled sites simply by typing your email address and password directly in the NET Passport signin box on that sites home page without first clicking the NET Passport signin button After you sign in to one NET Passportenabled site you can sign in to any other just by clicking the NET Passport sign in button on each site TO SIGN OUT click the NET Passport sign out button on the site Clicking this button at any site will sign you out of all NET Passportenabled sites TO CREATE YOUR PASSPORT WALLET AND USE PASSPORT EXPRESS PURCHASE You need a Passport wallet to use the Passport express purchase service A Passport wallet is a secure convenient way to store your credit card and billingshipping address information online You can create your Passport wallet now at To make an online purchase using the information stored in your Passport wallet click the Passport express purchase button at a participating site sign in to NET Passport if youre not already signed in and choose which credit card and shipping address you want to use Your information will be sent to the site instantly over a secure connection IF YOU FORGET YOUR PASSWORD Click this link to create your new password at the NET Passport Web site ppsecureMSRVResetPWasp OTHER IMPORTANT NET Passport LINKS If you want to view or change your NET Passport or wallet or if you need help visit NET Passport Member Services at memberservicesasp NET Passport is committed to protecting your privacy We encourage you to review our privacy statement at privacypolicyasp For more information about NET Passport visit IF CLICKING A LINK DOESNT WORK Copy it and then paste it into your Web browsers address bar Select the entire link which starts with and may include more than one line and then copy it usually by clicking the Edit menu item and then clicking Copy Next open your Web browser and click in the box where you usually see the Web page address Paste the link into this box usually by clicking Paste in the Edit menu and click Go or Enter Thank you for using your NET Passport NET Passport Customer Support Please do not reply to this message it was sent from an unmonitored email address and we are unable to respond to any replies
